message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of something more in the range of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.
